channel.title: Tornait x NotMiles - Falcons and Dragons
channel.description:
Tornait here! Proud to say that I’ve just finished a collab with the awesome guy @NotMiles! Called Falcons and Dragons... and it’s very spacey. Hope you enjoy the fruits of our labor!
https://soundcloud.com/tornait-jaybird/tornait-x-notmiles-falcons-and
P.S. It’s NotMiles’ first collab...

item.title: Tornait x NotMiles - Falcons and Dragons
item.dc:creator: Stickmanadventures
item.description:
Definitely my favorite Auxy song I’ve heard in a while . Love the chords and how the track sounds like Dance, EDM, Pop, and something out of a video game all at the same time. 11/10

Read full topic

item.title: Tornait x NotMiles - Falcons and Dragons
item.dc:creator: ChiefBC
item.description:
First things first, this track has a quite enjoyable vibe: very spacey. I quite like it. Also, that sound (I think it was Bee) around 1:17 was pretty cool. To me, it sounded like an astronaut talking through a radio to the space crew inside the atmosphere, though I don’t know if that was your intention.

One last thing I want to note is the collection of notes from 2:52 to 3:07. It sounded eccentric and off to me, as if it didn’t match the vibe of the rest of the song. Otherwise, this song was very good.

Keep on producing as long you enjoy it. Both of you.
Sincerely,
ChiefBC

Read full topic
item.source: Tornait x NotMiles - Falcons and Dragons
